SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.regdate, b.hit, b.id, b.likecnt, b.dislikecnt, b.notice_flag, m.name, m.grade, b.replycnt from board_${b_name} b INNER JOIN member m ON b.id=m.id where
b.del_flag = 0 and b.notice_flag = 0 order BY b.bno desc LIMIT #{limitNum}, #{amount}

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.regdate, b.hit, b.id, b.likecnt, b.dislikecnt, b.notice_flag, m.name, m.grade, b.replycnt from board_${b_name} b INNER JOIN member m ON b.id=m.id where b.del_flag = 0 and b.notice_flag = 1 order BY b.bno desc
SELECT bno, title, replycnt from board_free where del_flag = 0 and notice_flag = 0 order BY bno desc LIMIT 0,6
SELECT bno, title, replycnt from board_analysis where del_flag = 0 and notice_flag = 0 order BY bno desc LIMIT 0,6

select count(*) from board_${b_name} b INNER JOIN member m ON b.id=m.id where
del_flag = 0

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.regdate, b.updatedate, b.hit, b.id, b.likecnt, b.dislikecnt, b.notice_flag, m.name, m.grade from board_${b_name} b INNER JOIN member m ON b.id=m.id where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board_${b_name} (title, content, regdate, updatedate, hit, id) values (#{title}, #{content},now(),now(),0,#{id})
insert into board_${b_name} (title, content, regdate, updatedate, hit, id, notice_flag) values (#{title}, #{content},now(),now(),0,#{id},1)
mapper.select: SELECT t.rank FROM (SELECT bno, rank() over(ORDER BY bno ASC) AS rank FROM board_${b_name} where del_flag = 0) t WHERE t.bno= #{bno}
mapper.update: update board_${b_name} set del_flag = 1 ,updatedate = now() where bno = #{bno}
